forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 16C. S winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 60F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 57F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Wind increasing. A few clouds from time to time. High near 60F. Winds N at 20 to 30 mph.
